titleStmt.title: The Lancashire cuckold: or, The country parish-clark betray'd by a conjurer's inchanted chamber-pot To the tune of, Fond boy, &c. Licensed according to order,

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Blare, on London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "A Lancashire farmer he had a fair wife,".
Reproduction of original in Glasgow University Library.
